definition[0]: the narrow part in the middle of the human body
note[0]: slim-waisted/narrow-waisted/thick-waisted (=having a thin, thick etc waist)
example[0]: The skirt was too big around the waist.
example[1]: Lota was paralysed from the waist down.
definition[1]: the part of a piece of clothing that goes around this part of your body
